Min-Width

# Min-Width

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class              | Support        |
| ------------------ | -------------- |
| ```
min-w-0
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
min-w-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
min-w-full
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
min-w-min
```  | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
min-w-max
```  | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
min-w-fit
```  | 🌐 Web only    |
